alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Mahnomen; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 4:37PM CDT until May 30 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Northeastern Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... West central Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 436 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fosston, or 40 miles west of Bemidji, moving east at 20 mph. At 422 PM CDT, the public reported quarter size hail near Fertile. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fosston, Island Lake in Mahnomen County, Lengby, Ebro and Weme. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
